Content.description: About Us (Seeded SAMPLE)

ElectronicText.textData:
About Us

Fashion House is the online equivalent of browsing the aisles of the world's most fabulous fashion store.

As an eCommerce Site devoted to fashion, Fashion House brings together the most fashionable wares and the best brands allowing users to find the pinnacle of style and chic. Featuring products from the most popular designer brands and big name fashions, Fashion House lets users search the most stylish brands — by designer, brand, price point, and color. and &

Content.description: Contact Us (Seeded SAMPLE)
System error page used for Page-Not-Found conditions. You should not edit the ID.
Privacy Policy (Seeded SAMPLE)

ElectronicText.textData:
<#assign clientName = "Fashion House Inc.">

Privacy Policy

${clientName} Statement of Privacy

${clientName} is committed to protecting your privacy. This Statement of Privacy applies to ${clientName} Web site and governs data collection and usage at all ${clientName} sites and services; it does not apply to other online or offline sites, products or services. Please read the ${clientName} Statement of Privacy.

${clientName} is a general audience web site, intended for users of all ages. Personal information of all users is collected, used and disclosed as described in this Statement of Privacy.

${clientName} is a general audience web site, intended for users of all ages. Personal information of all users is collected, used and disclosed as described in this Statement of Privacy.

Collection of your Personal Information

As an E-commerce Web site, ${clientName} collects personal information, such as your e-mail address, name, home or work address or telephone number. Information collected by ${clientName} is used solely for the purpose of billing and shipping your online purchases. ${clientName} does not collect any information about your computer hardware and software.

${clientName} encourages you to review the privacy statements of Web sites you choose to link to from ${clientName} so that you can understand how those Web sites collect, use and share your information. We are not responsible for the privacy statements or other content on Web sites outside of the ${clientName} Web site.

Use of your Personal Information

${clientName} and its operational service partners collect and use your personal information to process product orders and deliver the products requested. It is possible that ${clientName} may also use personal information to inform you of other products or services available from DWS and its affiliates. ${clientName} may also contact you via surveys to conduct research about your opinion of current services or of potential new services that may be offered.

${clientName} does not sell, rent or lease its customer lists to third parties. ${clientName} may, from time to time, contact you on behalf of external business partners about a particular offering that may be of interest to you. In those cases, your personal information (e-mail, name, address, telephone number) is not transferred to the third party.

We occasionally hire other companies to provide limited services on our behalf, such as handling the processing and delivery of mailings, providing customer support, processing transactions, or performing statistical analysis of our services. We will only provide those companies the personal information they need to deliver the service. They are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information and are prohibited from using that information for any other purpose.

${clientName} does not use or disclose sensitive personal information, such as race, religion, or political affiliations, without your explicit consent.

${clientName} may access and/or disclose your personal information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: (a) conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process served on ${clientName} or the site; (b) protect and defend the rights or property of ${clientName}, including its Web site; or (c) act under exigent circumstances to protect the personal safety of users of ${clientName} or the public.

Personal information collected on this site may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country in which ${clientName} or its affiliates, subsidiaries or agents maintain facilities, and by using this site, you consent to any such transfer of information outside of your country. ${clientName} abides by the safe harbor framework as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of data from the European Union.

Security of your Personal Information

${clientName} is committed to protecting the security of your personal information. We use a variety of security technologies and procedures to help protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. For example, we store the personal information you provide on computer systems with limited access, that are located in controlled facilities.

Changes to this Statement

${clientName} will occasionally update this Statement of Privacy to reflect company and customer feedback. If there are material changes to this Statement or in how ${clientName} will use your personal information, ${clientName} will prominently post such changes prior to implementing the change. ${clientName} encourages you to periodically review this Statement to be informed of how ${clientName} is protecting your information.

Content.description: Return Policy (Seeded SAMPLE)

ElectronicText.textData:
<#assign clientName = "Fashion House Inc">

Return Policy

Our customers continue to be our top priority. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, return the merchandise accompanied by a register receipt within 30 days of purchase, for an exchange or refund. A 10 day period is required for a cash refund on check purchases. Returns with receipts over 30 days or without a receipt will receive store credit only. Gift receipts are valid for store credit or exchange of merchandise only.

Merchandise that is used, worn or in unsellable condition will not be accepted for refund, store credit or exchange. Returns of swimwear and intimate apparel require tickets properly attached to the merchandise. Other restrictions may apply.

Unfortunately, many retailers are subject to fraudulent return activity. Returns may also be limited or declined based upon our refund verification systems, which are used to process and track returns to help administer our loss prevention program.

Valid ID (drivers license, military ID, state issued photo ID card), name, address and signature are required for returns without a valid receipt or gift receipt. Customer signature may be required for returns (receipted and unreceipted). To learn about how we use and handle your information, please see our Privacy Notice. To make your returns quicker and easier please keep your receipt.

Content.description: Review Guidlines (Seeded SAMPLE)

ElectronicText.textData:
We value your feedback!

When writing your review, please consider the following guidelines:

  • Focus on the product and your individual experience using it
  • Provide details about why you liked or disliked a product
  • All submitted reviews are subject to the terms set forth in our Terms of Use

We reserve the right not to post your review if it contains any of the following types of content or violates other guidelines:

  • Obscenities, discriminatory language, or other language not suitable for a public forum
  • Advertisements, “spam” content, or references to other products, offers, or websites
  • Email addresses, URLs, phone numbers, physical addresses or other forms of contact information
  • Critical or spiteful comments on other reviews posted on the page or their authors

In addition, if you wish to share feedback with us about product selection, pricing, ordering, delivery or other customer service issues, please do not submit this feedback through a product review. Instead, contact us directly.

Enjoy writing your review!

Content.description: Review Terms and Conditions (Seeded SAMPLE)

ElectronicText.textData:
CUSTOMER RATINGS AND REVIEWS TERMS OF USE

These Terms of Use govern your conduct associated with the Customer Ratings and Review service offered. To the extent of any conflict between Privacy Policy and these Terms of Use, these Terms of Use shall control with respect to the CRR Service.

By submitting any content, you represent and warrant that:

  • you are the sole author and owner of the intellectual property rights thereto;
  • all "moral rights" that you may have in such content have been voluntarily waived by you;
  • all content that you post is accurate;
  • you are at least 13 years old;
  • use of the content you supply does not violate these Terms of Use and will not cause injury to any person or entity.

You further agree and warrant that you shall not submit any content:

  • that is known by you to be false, inaccurate or misleading;
  • that infringes any third party's copyright, patent, trademark, trade secret or other proprietary rights or rights of publicity or privacy;
  • that violates any law, statute, ordinance or regulation (including, but not limited to, those governing export control, consumer protection, unfair competition, anti-discrimination or false advertising);
  • that is, or may reasonably be considered to be, defamatory, libelous, hateful, racially or religiously biased or offensive, unlawfully threatening or unlawfully harassing to any individual, partnership or corporation;
  • for which you were compensated or granted any consideration by any third party;
  • that includes any information that references other websites, addresses, email addresses, contact information or phone numbers;
  • that contains any computer viruses, worms or other potentially damaging computer programs or files.

You agree to indemnify and hold our company (and its officers, directors, agents, subsidiaries, joint ventures, employees and third-party service providers.), harmless from all claims, demands, and damages (actual and consequential) of every kind and nature, known and unknown including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of a breach of your representations and warranties set forth above, or your violation of any law or the rights of a third party.

For any content that you submit, you grant a perpetual, irrevocable, royalty-free, transferable right and license to use, copy, modify, delete in its entirety, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from and/or sell and/or distribute such content and/or incorporate such content into any form, medium or technology throughout the world without compensation to you.

All content that you submit may be used at our sole discretion. We reserve the right to change, condense or delete any content on this website that we deem, in its sole discretion, to violate the content guidelines or any other provision of these Terms of Use. We do not guarantee that you will have any recourse to edit or delete any content you have submitted. Ratings and written comments are generally posted within two to four business days. However, we reserve the right to remove or to refuse to post any submission for any reason. You acknowledge that you are responsible for the contents of your submission. None of the content that you submit shall be subject to any obligation of confidence on the part of our company, its agents, subsidiaries, affiliates, partners or third party service providers and their respective directors, officers and employees.

By submitting your email address in connection with your rating and review, you agree that we and its third party service providers may use your email address to contact you about the status of your review and other administrative purposes.

Content.description: General additional PDP content

ElectronicText.textData:
Return Policy

If you are not completely satisfied with your Julie's online purchase, we will glady accept the return or exchange of unworn, unwashed or defective items, within 14 days of receipt of purchase. Please send original sales receipt with return shipment. Return/Exchange packages must be shipped pre-paid, preferably United Parcel Service(UPS) . Your card will be promtly credited(less the initial shipping charges), and a return credit receipt will be mailed to your shipping address (Return merchandise after 14 days of receipt of purchase OR without sales receipt will only be given current store price credit, less the $10.00 re-stocking fee ). Holiday and Seasonal theme merchandise will be allowed for returns 14 days after the calender Holiday date (i.e. Christmas merchandise can be returned for entire refund up to 14 days after December 25th).

To return or exchange an item, please follow these simple steps:
Repack the gift in its original packaging, if possible, with the original receipt and message.

include your order number in the following return shipping address:


  • Fashion House
  • Attn: Returns Department
  • (Your order number)
  • 1234 Main Street
  • Town, NY 11223

      • For your security, please return your gift with an insured courier (e.g., FedEx, UPS, USPS Parcel Post) and retain your receipt. Fashion House is not responsible for items damaged or lost in transit. If you are returning an item because it was received damaged, defective or not the correct item purchased, Fashion House will reimburse the return shipping charges.

Content.description: A content-spot displayed on the PDP if the product is not yet available. Product Introduced Date is greater than [today].
The actual email content that will be included in the Abandoned Cart email. Other PARAMETERS control the timing of this email.

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

${uiLabelMap.SalutationEmailInfo} ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

Thanks for recently visiting ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""} Just a reminder, the items we're holding in your shopping cart will expire in a few days.

To purchase the items in your cart now, just login to your account. You can also review your selections, add more items, change what you've already picked, and place your order by proceeding to checkout.

We will even sweeten the deal by offering you an additional ${discountPercent?if_exists} discount if you purchase these items today! Just enter the discount code ${promoCode?if_exists} during checkout.

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_ITEMS" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

If you have any questions about our products, or need help with your purchase, please call our Customer Care Center at ${EMAIL_CLNT_TEL_NO!""}

Happy Shopping!

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: The actual email content that will be included in the Change-Customer email (when the customer updates their profile).

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

Just a quick notification to inform you of a recent change to your personal information.

If you did not make these changes then may we suggest that you return to ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""}, login and modify your password. This will protect you from further changes.

Your logon id is the Email address you supplied when you registered:

${LOGIN_EMAIL!""}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: Content that is included at the end of all BigFish generated emails. Use this to define standard closing information such as Yours-Sincerely and your company contact information.

ElectronicText.textData:
Thank you,

The ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} Team

${EMAIL_CLNT_REPLY_TO!""}

Visit us at: ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""}

This message was sent to the following e-mail address: ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""} Not interested in ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} emails? It's easy to unsubscribe. Be sure to add ${EMAIL_CLNT_REPLY_TO!""} to your address book or safe senders list so our emails get to your inbox.

This email was sent from a notification-only email address that cannot accept incoming email. © 2013 ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} or its affiliates. All rights reserved. ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} and the ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} logo are trademarks of ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_LINK!""} or its affiliates.

Content.description: Content that is included in the beginning of all BigFish generated emails. Use this to define standard heading information such as your logo and company information.

ElectronicText.textData:
<#assign HOME_SUB_URL="/online/control/main" /> <#assign SHOP_SUB_URL="/online/shop" /> <#assign RINGS="${HTTP_HOST!}${SHOP_SUB_URL!}/rings" /> <#assign NECKLACE="${HTTP_HOST!}${SHOP_SUB_URL!}/necklace" /> <#assign BRACELET="${HTTP_HOST!}${SHOP_SUB_URL!}/bracelet-and-anklets" /> <#assign EARRINGS="${HTTP_HOST!}${SHOP_SUB_URL!}/earrings" /> <#assign GIFT="${HTTP_HOST!}${SHOP_SUB_URL!}/gift-ideas" /> <#if EMAIL_CLNT_LOGO?exists && EMAIL_CLNT_LOGO?has_content>
Rings Necklace Bracelets & Anklets Earrings Gift Ideas

Content.description: Common Email Styles

The actual email content that will be included in the Contact-Us email. This email is sent to both the customer and the client. Len: not sure how this works since we probably grab content from the form.

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

For more immediate attention you may call us at ${EMAIL_CLNT_TEL_NO!""} during our normal business hours of operation 9:00 to 5:00 EST. For all online inquiries, we will do everything we can to respond within [2 business days].

${uiLabelMap.ReasonForContactCaption} ${parameters.contactReason?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.FirstNameCaption} ${parameters.firstName!}

${uiLabelMap.LastNameCaption} ${parameters.lastName!}

${uiLabelMap.EmailAddressCaption} ${parameters.email!}

<#if parameters.contactPhoneArea?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.ContactPhoneCaption} <#assign areaCode = parameters.contactPhoneArea!""> <#assign contactPhoneContact = parameters.contactPhoneContact!""> <#assign fullPhone = areaCode + contactPhoneContact> <#if fullPhone?has_content && fullPhone?length == 10> <#assign contactPhoneContact = contactPhoneContact?substring(0, 3) + "-" + contactPhoneContact?substring(3)> <#assign fullPhone = areaCode + "-" + contactPhoneContact> ${fullPhone!""}

<#if parameters.orderIdNumber?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.OrderNumberCaption} ${parameters.orderIdNumber!}

${uiLabelMap.CommentCaption} ${parameters.message!}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: The actual email content that will be included in the Forgot-Password email.

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

We have generated a new password for you.

Your password has been changed to: ${password!""}

Use this password next time you log in.

You can change the password from the My Account page.

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: Common Email Head Tag Include
The actual email content that will be included in the Mailing-List email. This email sent to both the customer and the client.

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Thank you for sign up for the ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} mailing list. You'll receive promotions and special offers at the email address below:

${uiLabelMap.EmailAddressCaption} ${parameters.SUBSCRIBER_EMAIL?if_exists}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: The actual email content that will be included in the New-Customer email (when the customer completes the registration form).

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

Thank you for registering your account with ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""}.

Your login id is the Email address you supplied when you registered: ${LOGIN_EMAIL!""}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: The actual email content that will be included in the Order-Change email (when the Status on the Order gets modified from one state to another).

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

<#assign statusItem = ORDER.getRelatedOneCache("StatusItem")!/> ${uiLabelMap.OrderStatusChangeMessage} ${statusItem.get("description",locale)?default(statusItem.statusId?default("N/A"))}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_DETAIL" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: The actual email content that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

Thank you for your purchase! Below is a confirmation of your order.

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_DETAIL" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: Content 'order detail' that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).

ElectronicText.textData: <#if ORDER?has_content> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_PAYMENTS" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_SHIPMENTS" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_ITEMS" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_ITEM_SUMMARY" ignoreTemplate="true"/> </#if>

Content.description: Content 'order detail' that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).

ElectronicText.textData:
<#if ORDER_HELPER?exists> <#assign displayParty = ORDER_HELPER.getPlacingParty()?if_exists/> <#if displayParty?has_content> <#if !userLogin?exists || !userLogin?has_content> <#assign userLogin = USER_LOGIN! /> <#assign fullName= displayParty.firstName!/> <#if displayParty.firstName?has_content> <#assign fullName= fullName+ " " + displayParty.lastName!/> <#else> <#assign fullName=displayParty.lastName!/> <#-- ORDER DETAIL TABLE -->

${uiLabelMap.OrderInformationHeading}
${uiLabelMap.OrderNumberCaption} ${ORDER.orderId!}
${uiLabelMap.NameCaption} ${(fullName)?default("[Name Not Found]")}
${uiLabelMap.OrderDateCaption} ${ORDER.orderDate?string("yyyy-MM-dd")}

Content.description: Content 'order items' that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).

ElectronicText.textData:
<#if ORDER_ITEMS?has_content> <#list ORDER_ITEMS as orderItem> <#assign product = orderItem.getRelatedOneCache("Product")?if_exists/> <#-- should always exist because of FK constraint, but just in case --> <#assign urlProductId = product.productId> <#if product.isVariant?if_exists?upper_case == "Y"> <#assign virtualProduct = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductWorker"].getParentProduct(product.productId, delegator)?if_exists> <#assign urlProductId=virtualProduct.productId> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if (!productImageUrl?has_content && !(productImageUrl == "null")) && virtualProduct?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(virtualProduct, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#-- If the string is a literal "null" make it an "" empty string then all normal logic can stay the same --> <#if (productImageUrl?string?has_content && (productImageUrl == "null"))> <#assign productImageUrl = ""> <#if !productImageUrl?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = "/osafe_theme/images/icon/place_holder_small.jpg"> <#assign prodDescription = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "DESCRIPTION", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if !prodDescription?has_content && virtualProduct?has_content> <#assign prodDescription = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(virtualProduct, "DESCRIPTION", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#assign productName = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "PRODUCT_NAME", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if !productName?has_content && virtualProduct?has_content> <#assign productName = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(virtualProduct, "PRODUCT_NAME", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#-- ITEM STATUS --> <#assign itemStatus = orderItem.getRelatedOne("StatusItem")/> <#assign itemOrderStatus = delegator.findByAnd("OrderStatus", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("orderId",orderItem.orderId,"statusId",orderItem.statusId,"orderItemSeqId",orderItem.orderItemSeqId))/> <#assign itemOrderStatus = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getFirst(itemOrderStatus)/>

${uiLabelMap.OrderItemsHeading}
    ${uiLabelMap.QuantityLabel} ${uiLabelMap.PriceLabel} ${uiLabelMap.TotalLabel}
${StringUtil.wrapString(productName)} <#if features?has_content> <#list features as feature> <#assign productFeatureType = feature.getRelatedOne("ProductFeatureType")>
${productFeatureType.description!""}: ${feature.description?default("")}
${orderItem.quantity?string.number} <@ofbizCurrency amount=orderItem.unitPrice isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING /> <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_HELPER.getOrderItemSubTotal(orderItem,ORDER_HELPER.getAdjustments()) isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING />

Content.description: Content 'order item summary' that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).

ElectronicText.textData:
<#if ORDER_ITEMS?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.OrderSummaryHeading}
<#if ORDER_ADJUSTMENTS?has_content> <#list ORDER_ADJUSTMENTS as orderHeaderAdjustment> <#assign adjustmentType = orderHeaderAdjustment.getRelatedOneCache("OrderAdjustmentType")> <#assign productPromo = orderHeaderAdjustment.getRelatedOneCache("ProductPromo")!""> <#assign promoCodeText = ""/> <#if productPromo?has_content> <#assign promoText = productPromo.promoText?if_exists/> <#assign productPromoCode = productPromo.getRelated("ProductPromoCode")> <#assign promoCodesEntered = ORDER_HELPER.getProductPromoCodesEntered()!""/> <#if promoCodesEntered?has_content> <#list promoCodesEntered as promoCodeEntered> <#if productPromoCode?has_content> <#list productPromoCode as promoCode> <#assign promoCodeEnteredId = promoCodeEntered/> <#assign promoCodeId = promoCode.productPromoCodeId!""/> <#if promoCodeEnteredId?has_content> <#if promoCodeId == promoCodeEnteredId> <#assign promoCodeText = promoCode.productPromoCodeId?if_exists/> <#if (!Static["com.osafe.util.Util"].isProductStoreParmTrue(CHECKOUT_SUPPRESS_TAX_IF_ZERO!"")) || (ORDER_TAX_TOTAL?has_content && (ORDER_TAX_TOTAL > 0))>
${uiLabelMap.SubTotalLabel} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_SUB_TOTAL isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING />
<#if promoText?has_content>${promoText}<#if promoCodeText?has_content> (${promoCodeText} )<#else>${ORDER_HELPER.getAdjustmentType(orderHeaderAdjustment)} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_HELPER.getOrderAdjustmentTotal(orderHeaderAdjustment) isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING />
${uiLabelMap.ShippingAndHandlingLabel} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_SHIP_TOTAL isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING/>
${uiLabelMap.TaxLabel} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_TAX_TOTAL isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING/>
${uiLabelMap.TotalLabel} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_TOTAL isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING />

Content.description: Content 'order payments' that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).

ElectronicText.textData:
<#if ORDER_PAYMENTS?has_content || ORDER_PAYMENT_TYPE?has_content> <#assign payInStore="N"/> <#assign orderAttrPickupStore = ORDER.getRelatedByAnd("OrderAttribute", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("attrName", "STORE_LOCATION"))/> <#if orderAttrPickupStore?has_content> <#assign payInStore="Y"/> <#-- Process ALL possible payments --> <#assign orderPaymentPref=ORDER_HELPER.getPaymentPreferences()/> <#list orderPaymentPref as orderPaymentPreference> <#-- Assignments that apply to all payment types --> <#assign paymentNumber = ""> <#assign creditCard = ""> <#assign oppStatusItem = orderPaymentPreference.getRelatedOne("StatusItem")> <#assign paymentMethod = orderPaymentPreference.getRelatedOne("PaymentMethod")?if_exists> <#assign paymentMethodType = orderPaymentPreference.getRelatedOne("PaymentMethodType")?if_exists> <#-- Assignments for CREDIT CARD payment --> <#if "CREDIT_CARD" == orderPaymentPreference.paymentMethodTypeId> <#assign creditCard = paymentMethod.getRelatedOne("CreditCard")> <#if creditCard?has_content> <#assign cardType = creditCard.cardType!""> <#assign cardNumber = creditCard.cardNumber!""> <#assign paymentNumber = cardNumber?substring(cardNumber?length - 4)> <#assign paymentNumber = cardType + "-" + paymentNumber> <#-- Assignments for GIFTCARD payment --> <#if "GIFT_CARD" == orderPaymentPreference.paymentMethodTypeId> <#assign giftCard = paymentMethod.getRelatedOne("GiftCard")?if_exists> <#if giftCard?has_content> <#assign paymentNumber = giftCard.cardNumber!""> <#-- Output retrieved values --> <#if payInStore == "Y"> <#else> <#if paymentNumber?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.PaymentInformationHeading}
Payment Method:${uiLabelMap.PayInStoreLabel}${paymentMethodType.description?default(paymentMethodType.paymentMethodTypeId)}
Card Number: ${paymentNumber}
Amount: <@ofbizCurrency amount=orderPaymentPreference.maxAmount isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING/>

Content.description: Content 'order shipments' that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).

ElectronicText.textData:
<#assign orderAttrPickupStore = ORDER.getRelatedByAnd("OrderAttribute", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("attrName", "STORE_LOCATION"))/> <#if orderAttrPickupStore?has_content> <#assign orderAttribute= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getFirst(orderAttrPickupStore)/> <#assign storeId=orderAttribute.attrValue!/> <#assign storeParty= delegator.findOne("Party", {"partyId", storeId}, true)!""/> <#if storeParty?has_content> <#assign storePartyContactPurpose= storeParty.getRelatedCache("PartyContactMechPurpose")/> <#assign storePartyContactPurpose= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].filterByDate(storePartyContactPurpose,true)/> <#assign storePartyContactPurpose= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].orderBy(storePartyContactPurpose,Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toList("-fromDate"))/> <#assign storeLocations = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].filterByAnd(storePartyContactPurpose, Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("contactMechPurposeTypeId", "GENERAL_LOCATION"))/> <#assign storeLocations= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getRelatedCache("PartyContactMech", storeLocations)/> <#assign storeLocations= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].filterByDate(storeLocations,true)/> <#assign storeLocations = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].orderBy(storeLocations,Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toList("fromDate DESC"))/> <#if storeLocations?has_content> <#assign storeLocation = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getFirst(storeLocations)/> <#assign storeAddress= storeLocation.getRelatedOneCache("PostalAddress")/> <#assign storeGroup= delegator.findOne("PartyGroup", {"partyId", storeId}, true)!""/> <#if storeGroup?has_content> <#assign storeName= storeGroup.groupName!/> <#if storeName?has_content> <#else> <#if storeAddress.address1?has_content> <#if storeAddress.address2?has_content> <#if storeAddress.address3?has_content> <#if storeAddress.city?has_content> <#assign shippingStateGeo = (delegator.findOne("Geo", {"geoId", storeAddress.stateProvinceGeoId?if_exists}, false))?if_exists /> <#else> <#if ORDER_ITEM_SHIP_GROUP?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.ShippingInformationHeading}
${uiLabelMap.StorePickupCaption} ${storeName}
${uiLabelMap.ShippingMethodCaption} ${uiLabelMap.StorePickupCaption} ${storeGroup.groupName}
  ${storeAddress.address1}
  ${storeAddress.address2}
  ${storeAddress.address3}
  ${storeAddress.city}, ${shippingStateGeo.geoName!""} ${storeAddress.postalCode!""}
<#assign groupIdx = 0> <#list ORDER_ITEM_SHIP_GROUP as shipGroup> <#assign shippingAddress = shipGroup.getRelatedOne("PostalAddress")?if_exists> <#assign groupNumber = shipGroup.shipGroupSeqId?if_exists> <#if shippingAddress?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.toName?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.address1?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.address2?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.address3?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.city?has_content> <#assign shippingStateGeo = (delegator.findOne("Geo", {"geoId", shippingAddress.stateProvinceGeoId?if_exists}, false))?if_exists /> <#assign shippingCountryGeo = (delegator.findOne("Geo", {"geoId", shippingAddress.countryGeoId?if_exists}, false))?if_exists /> <#if shippingCountryGeo?has_content> <#assign shipmentMethodType = shipGroup.getRelatedOne("ShipmentMethodType")?if_exists> <#assign carrierPartyId = shipGroup.carrierPartyId?if_exists> <#if shipGroup.trackingNumber?has_content || ORDER_SHIPPING_INFO?has_content> <#if shipGroup.trackingNumber?has_content> <#if shipGroup.estimatedShipDate?has_content> <#if ORDER_SHIPPING_INFO?has_content> <#list ORDER_SHIPPING_INFO as orderShipmentInfoSummary> <#if (ORDER_SHIPPING_INFO?size > 1)> <#if orderShipmentInfoSummary.estimatedShipDate?has_content> <#if orderShipmentInfoSummary.trackingCode?has_content> <#if orderShipmentInfoSummary.boxNumber?has_content> <#assign groupIdx = groupIdx + 1>

${uiLabelMap.ShippingInformationHeading}
${uiLabelMap.DestinationCaption}  
  ${shippingAddress.toName}
  ${shippingAddress.address1}
  ${shippingAddress.address2}
  ${shippingAddress.address3}
  ${shippingAddress.city}, ${shippingStateGeo.geoName!""} ${shippingAddress.postalCode!""}
  ${shippingCountryGeo.geoName!""}
${uiLabelMap.ShippingMethodCaption} ${carrierPartyId!""} <#if shipmentMethodType?exists>${shipmentMethodType.description!""}
${uiLabelMap.TrackingNumberCaption} ${shipGroup.trackingNumber}
${uiLabelMap.ShipDateCaption} ${shipGroup.estimatedShipDate?string(FORMAT_DATE)}
  ${orderShipmentInfoSummary.shipmentPackageSeqId}
  ${orderShipmentInfoSummary.estimatedShipDate}
  ${orderShipmentInfoSummary.trackingCode}
  ${orderShipmentInfoSummary.boxNumber}

Content.description: The actual email content that will be included in the Request-Catalog email. This email is sent to both the customer and the client. Len: not sure how this works since we probably grab content from the form.

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

You have requested a catalog and we will process this request as quickly as possible. The catalog will be mailed to:

<#if parameters.fullName?exists && parameters.fullName?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.AddressFullNameCaption} ${parameters.fullName!}

<#else>

${uiLabelMap.FirstNameCaption} ${parameters.firstName!}

${uiLabelMap.LastNameCaption} ${parameters.lastName?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.AddressLine1Caption} ${parameters.address1?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.AddressLine2Caption} ${parameters.address2?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.TownOrCityCaption} ${parameters.city?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.StateOrProvinceCaption} ${parameters.stateCode?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.PostalCodeOrZipCaption} ${parameters.postalCode?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.EmailAddressCaption} ${parameters.email?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.ContactPhoneCaption} <#if fullPhone?has_content && fullPhone?length == 10> <#assign contactPhoneContact = contactPhoneContact?substring(0, 3) + "-" + contactPhoneContact?substring(4)> <#assign fullPhone = areaCode + "-" + contactPhoneContact> ${fullPhone!""}

${uiLabelMap.CommentCaption} ${parameters.message?if_exists}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Content.description: The actual email content that will be included in the Scheduled Job email. This email sent to both the customer and the client.

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<#if EMAIL_CLNT_LOGO?exists && EMAIL_CLNT_LOGO?has_content>
Technical Services Notification

${uiLabelMap.JobNameLabel} ${SCHED_JOB_NAME!}

${uiLabelMap.JobStatusLabel} ${SCHED_JOB_STATUS!}

${uiLabelMap.JobInfoLabel} ${SCHED_JOB_INFO!}

Content.description: The actual email content that will be included in the Ship Review email. Other PARAMETERS control the timing of this email.

ElectronicText.textData:
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

We recently shipped items to you - we certainly hope you are enjoying our products.

We'd love to get your feedback!! Simply click on the Review link below and you will have an opportunity to post a review on our site.

<#list ORDER_ITEMS as orderItem> <#assign product = orderItem.getRelatedOneCache("Product")?if_exists/> <#-- should always exist because of FK constraint, but just in case --> <#assign urlProductId = product.productId> <#if product.isVariant?if_exists?upper_case == "Y"> <#assign virtualProduct = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductWorker"].getParentProduct(product.productId, delegator)?if_exists> <#assign urlProductId=virtualProduct.productId> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if (!productImageUrl?has_content && !(productImageUrl == "null")) && virtualProduct?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(virtualProduct, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#-- If the string is a literal "null" make it an "" empty string then all normal logic can stay the same --> <#if (productImageUrl?string?has_content && (productImageUrl == "null"))> <#assign productImageUrl = ""> <#if !productImageUrl?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = "/osafe_theme/images/user_content/image/place_holder_small.jpg"> <#assign prodDescription = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "LONG_DESCRIPTION", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#assign productName = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "PRODUCT_NAME", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if !productName?has_content && virtualProduct?has_content> <#assign productName = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(virtualProduct, "PRODUCT_NAME", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists>
${productName} ${uiLabelMap.ReviewLabel}
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
